actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the back side of United States paper money of the denomination of $1 to be printed by a method other than the intaglio process.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to permit the back side of one-dollar bills to be printed by a method other than the intaglio process.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the back side of United States paper money of the denomination of $1 to be printed by a method other than the intaglio process.
